meanings.definition: A graphical representation of the interference pattern produced by the superposition of two or more waves.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the interferogram to understand how waves interact.
meanings.sent2: The interferogram displayed the combined wave patterns clearly.
meanings.sent3: The interferogram looked like a colorful dance of waves on paper.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an interferogram of thoughts, each one influencing the other.
meanings.sent5: The interferogram was like a map of wave collisions, guiding the researchers.

meanings.definition: A visual display showing the variations in interference fringes produced by an interferometer.
meanings.sent1: The interferogram on the screen revealed the interference fringes clearly.
meanings.sent2: Researchers analyzed the interferogram to measure the interference patterns.
meanings.sent3: The interferogram winked playfully as the fringes danced across the display.
meanings.sent4: His emotions were an interferogram of highs and lows, just like the fringes on the screen.
meanings.sent5: The interferogram painted a vivid picture of wave interactions for the team.
